title: Exquisite Kundan Jadau Haaram with Emerald & Ruby Accents
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This magnificent Haaram features a classic Kundan Jadau setting, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The intricate design incorporates floral motifs and delicate engravings, reflecting the rich heritage of South Indian craftsmanship. A prominent central pendant adds to the grandeur. The design includes gold beads dangling at the bottom
colors: Primarily gold with brilliant white from the Kundan stones
punctuated by vibrant green Emeralds and deep red Rubies. The combination represents prosperity
and auspiciousness in South Indian traditions.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and other significant celebrations. Also suitable for upscale parties and formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Haaram is not just a piece of jewelry; it's an heirloom. The impeccable Kundan craftsmanship, combined with the brilliance of Emeralds and Rubies, makes it a timeless investment. The rich cultural significance and traditional design add to its value, making it a cherished piece for generations.
